description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Hate having to go outside to mow the lawn? Now you can do it while still indoors! Armed with a lawn mower and a weed eater, you have the mission of mowing a virtual lawn as fast as you can. Try not to mow any cats...
description.short: Hate having to go outside to mow the lawn? Now you can do it while still indoors! Armed with a lawn mower and a weed eater, you have the mission of mowing a virtual lawn as fast as you can. Try not to mow any cats...
